title: Claude Code v2.1.29
description: Bug fix release fixing startup performance issues when resuming sessions with saved_hook_context.

title: Claude Code v2.1.27
description: Added tool call failures and denials to debug logs, --from-pr flag to resume sessions from PRs, automatic PR linking, and fixed context management validation for gateway users. Also fixed /context command colors, OAuth token expiration in VSCode, and Windows bash execution issues.

title: GitHub Copilot now supports OpenCode
description: GitHub now officially supports using Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, or Enterprise subscription with OpenCode through a formal partnership, allowing authentication with OpenCode.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex now available in Visual Studio, JetBrains, Xcode, and Eclipse
description: Expanded GPT-5.2-Codex availability to more IDEs including Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse, following the general availability announcement on January 14.

community_feedback.quote: How is GPT-5.2-Codex in Copilot? Discussion about 400k context window

title: Wave 14: Arena Mode
description: Major release introducing Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison with hidden identities and voting system, plus Plan Mode for smarter task planning with detailed implementation plans before coding.

community_feedback.quote: Arena Mode in Windsurf: One prompt. Two models. Your vote
Wave 14: Arena Mode - May the Best Model Win discussion on Reddit

title: Bug Fixes for Cascade and Codemaps
description: Fixed permanently disconnected cascades, commit message generation, and codemaps suggestions. Improved diff zones performance and overall stability.

title: Bug Fixes and Improvements
description: Fixed commit message generation and codemaps suggestions with various bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: Enterprise Features and Diff Zone Improvements
description: Enterprise admins can now specify organization-wide allow and deny lists for command auto-execution. Includes bug fixes and performance improvements for diff zones.

title: Agentic memory for GitHub Copilot in public preview
description: Copilot Memory is now in public preview for all paid GitHub Copilot plans, enabling Copilot to learn and retain useful details about your repositories as you work.

title: This Week In Continue - January 13-20, 2026
description: Weekly update featuring new agent skills feature merged and WSL shell selection fix. Includes daily beta releases that promote to stable after 7 days.

title: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Version 2.4 introduces Subagents for parallel task execution with specialized context, Skills system for domain-specific workflows, and built-in image generation capabilities using Google Nano Banana Pro model.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor now uses subagents to complete parts of a task in parallel. Subagents lead to faster overall execution and better context usage

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Generally Available
description: GPT-5.2-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Business, Pro, and Pro+ plans. OpenAI's latest model designed for agentic coding with large codebase support.

title: Copilot BYOK Enhancements
description: Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) for GitHub Copilot now supports additional APIs, new configuration options, and more provider integrations including support for Responses API and new providers.

title: Copilot CLI Enhanced Agents and Context Management
description: GitHub Copilot CLI update brings enhanced agents with improved capabilities, better context management for more relevant suggestions, and new installation methods for easier setup.
